title: Child Safety: Personal Information
description: Detects attempts to collect personal information from minors
pattern: (?i)(where do you live|how old are you|what's your (address|phone|email))

title: Child Safety: Harmful Content
description: Detects content that could be harmful to minors

title: Child Safety: Grooming Indicators
description: Detects potential grooming patterns in conversation
pattern: (?i)(our secret|don't tell anyone|special relationship|promise not to tell|just between us)

title: Child Safety: Age Verification Bypass
description: Detects attempts to bypass age verification
